vlive.korean: 원숭이 흉내 한 번만 해줘 - 언니가 더 잘 어울리지 않아? 원숭이? Please pretend like you're a monkey. - But you're more of a monkey than me. 듣기 View video ITZY : 기습 채리❤️
vlive.english: Please pretend like you're a monkey. - But you're more of a monkey than me.
